name: Iris
description: Isis is the godess of life, magic, marriage, and fertility. Her name means throne,  marking her as a symbol of royal authority, the greates mother, and a devoted wife.

skills.name: Omniscient Arrow
skills.description: After every 2 Normal Attacks, Isis's next attack becomes an Omniscient Arrow, which deals DMG equal to 160% of ATK plus bonus DMG equal to 10% of the target's max HP (up to 300% of her ATK).

upgrades.level2: Omniscient Arrow is guaranteed to trigger when the battle starts.
upgrades.level3: The bonus DMG is increased to 12% of the target's max HP (up to 400% of her ATK).
upgrades.level4: The arrow will deal DMG equal to 200% of ATK.

skills.name: Omnipotence
skills.description: Isis channels her power and briefly enters the [Omniscient] state. Her ATK SPD is increased by 100% and her attack range becomes infinite, but she loses 45 Energy every 0.2s when she is in the state.

upgrades.level2: Every Normal Attack becomes an Omniscient Arrow for the duration of the skill.

skills.name: The Cunning Goddess
skills.description: When no enemies are within 3 meters of Isis, her ATK is increased by 30%. She loses this bonus when an enemy is within 3 meters of her.

upgrades.level2: Increases Isis's Armor PEN by 10% while ATK bonus lasts.
upgrades.level4: Increases Isis's Armor PEN by 20% while the ATK bonus lasts.

skills.name: True Name Invocation
skills.description: For every 5 Ultimates cast by allies, Isis gains 20% increased ATK SPD, stacking up to 4 times.

upgrades.level2: Increases each stack of ATK SPD bonus to 25%.
upgrades.level3: Gains 1 extra stack of ATK SPD buff when the battle starts.
upgrades.level4: Increases each stack of ATK SPD bonus to 30%. (Unlocks at Lv.281)

relic.name: Pristine Mantra
relic.description: Reduces the trigger count required for True Name Invocation to 3. Its stacks grant Isis additional effects: Each stack increases Isis's Hit Rate by 20%.

upgrades.level2: Increases CRIT Rate by 30% at 3 stacks.
upgrades.level4: Each stack increases Hit Rate by 30%. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)
